meanings: (욕설) [명사] swear word, curse, (informal) cuss word, insult, abuse, abusive[foul, profane] language, (formal) profanity, [동사] swear (at),...
(치욕스러운 일) (치욕) shame, disgrace, humiliation, insult; (능욕) rape

vlive.korean: 제가 욕을 평소에 너무 많이 해서... I usually curse a lot... 듣기 View video NCT : 나른쟌
저 욕 먹는 거 아니에요? Fans will curse me. 듣기 View video HANABONO : 바이허에서 퍼스널컬러 진단받고 여름 쿨톤 블러셔 추천하기 Summer Coolton light/Blusher Review
방금 제가 욕했나요? and did I say a swear word? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 긋
vlive.english: and did I say a swear word?

vlive.korean: 욕이 아니라 그 좀 약간... Not cursing. But you know... 듣기 View video NCT : 오랜만이다아 JS
그거 엄마 욕하는 거 아냐? Isn't that cursing your mom? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 18. 용인대 리퍼블릭 VS 고려대 테라 배틀에 심사위원 실화?!

examples.korean: The referee had been threatened and abused. 발음듣기 그 심판은 협박을 당하고 욕을 들었었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The referee had been threatened and abused. 발음

examples.korean: He called her the foulest names imaginable. 발음듣기 그는 그녀에게 상상할 수 있는 온갖 욕을 다 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He called her the foulest names imaginable. 발음

examples.korean: He got the sack for swearing. 발음듣기 그는 욕을 했다가 파면당했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He got the sack for swearing. 발음

examples.korean: She fell over and swore loudly. 발음듣기 그녀가 벌렁 나자빠지면서 큰 소리로 욕을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She fell over and swore loudly. 발음

examples.korean: I was shocked at the swearing. 발음듣기 나는 그 욕을 듣고 충격을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was shocked at the swearing. 발음
